Kicking the Tires, Again

Dec 1, 2015
1 minute read

And here I am, kicking the tires on a new way to blog. I like that this is fully Githubbed out, and is helping me blow the dust off my git knowledge. I like the thought of using Jekyll and hosting it for free too, to be honest.

It’s not necessarily the right time for me to be doing any sort of side- side- project, but hey: if I start writing again, I’ll be glad I did it.

There are still some things probably leftover here and there from the theme’s site, but I’m sure I will clean those up in time. I’m working on fixing some images, too.
